task.summary: Default task
Installed testing suite. Tested user model
Routing now refactored into seperate file
Increased testing. Modified mongoose User schema to do more work
Adding extra files
Created tests and functionality for displaying user account information
Moved route middleware into seperate folder. Create payment functionality for ripple_account model
Removed test.js file in ecommerce folder
created tests for user payments
Validate user route now works. tests created for validate user
Users can deposit, and transfer money
Placed paypal and ripple config information into config file. Modified package script to change NODE_ENV to test (rather than doing manually in individual test files)
created payouts method in paypal_methods
Changed passwords to pins, and users pin numbers are now stored as salted hashes along side salts. Testing for users also completed
Refactored code from email and password to phone_number and pin
Created Retailer Schema
Retailer saving and digest authentication now working
Created payment_request model
Retailers are able to upload payment requests and users are able to see these and either pay or cancel
Retailers and users can query to see either only paid or unpaid requests
Ripple secret now stored in encrypted form (have probably broken all the tests now)
Decrypt now catches incorrect pins and returns false
Middleware included that decrypts users ripple secret. Updated ripple payments tests to include pin in request
Fixed but with validating users Updated payment tests to include pins
Devices can now be authorized to make requests on users behalf
Digest authorisation put in place
Users can now logout of devices that they were previously logged in on
Retailer can now get notified of changes to payment_request through webhook
Validation occurs with loggin in a device if Ripple_Account is not validated

Removed validate function from payment_methods and from routes.
/v1/user/validate is no longer a valid route
Basic-user authentication added to passport authentication strategies
Changed error information to arrive in message (for easily directing to users)
BUGFIX: log_out_device did not allow users to log back in again
added logging features and removed authentication requirements for deposit money
User required to pass phone_number as final argument for deposit
All transactions are now saved to transactions collection for retrieval at a later date
Added route for users to be able to query previous transactions
Added route for users to be able to query previous transactions
Small mistake hehe
Updated error messages.
